subject: General English
question_en: Which word pair is a set of homophones?
explanation_en: Both pairs sound alike but have different meanings, making them homophones.
explanation_hi: दोनों युग्म एक जैसा उच्चारण रखते हैं पर अर्थ भिन्न होता है, इसलिए समोच्चारी हैं।

subject: General English
question_en: Choose the correct homophone to fill the gap: I need to ___ the letter.
question_hi: सही समोच्चारी चुनें: मुझे पत्र ___ करना है।
explanation_en: 'post' is the correct word here; it sounds like 'posed' but meaning differs.
explanation_hi: 'post' सही शब्द है; यह 'posed' जैसा लगता है पर अर्थ अलग है।

subject: General English
question_en: Which sentence uses the homophone pair 'their / there' correctly?
question_hi: कौन-सा वाक्य 'their / there' युग्म को सही प्रयोग करता है?
A_en: There books are on the table.
A_hi: There books are on the table।
explanation_en: 'Their' shows possession, 'there' indicates place; option C uses both correctly.
explanation_hi: 'Their' स्वामित्व दिखाता है, 'there' स्थान; विकल्प C दोनों को सही लगाता है।

subject: General English
question_en: Which of these is a homophone of 'knight'?
question_hi: इनमें से 'knight' का समोच्चारी कौन-सा है?
explanation_en: 'knight' and 'night' are pronounced the same way.
explanation_hi: 'knight' और 'night' एक जैसा उच्चारित होते हैं।

subject: General English
question_en: Fill in the blank with the correct homophone: The ___ of the story is very interesting.
question_hi: रिक्त स्थान की पूर्ति सही समोच्चारी से करें: कहानी का ___ बहुत रोचक है।
explanation_en: 'moral' (lesson) sounds like 'morale' but fits the context.
explanation_hi: 'moral' (नीति) 'morale' जैसा ध्वनित होता है पर सन्दर्भ में फिट बैठता है।

subject: General English
question_en: Which word is NOT a homophone of any other given word?
question_hi: कौन-सा शब्द किसी अन्य दिए गए शब्द का समोच्चारी नहीं है?
explanation_en: 'sugar' has no common homophone, while the others form pairs.
explanation_hi: 'sugar' का कोई सामान्य समोच्चारी नहीं, जबकि बाकी युग्म बनाते हैं।

subject: General English
question_en: Identify the homophone pair used in this sentence: 'The actor played a role that helped him reach his goal.'
question_hi: वाक्य में प्रयुक्त समोच्चारी युग्म पहचानें: 'The actor played a role that helped him reach his goal.'
explanation_en: 'role' and 'roll' are homophones; the sentence uses 'role'.
explanation_hi: 'role' और 'roll' समोच्चारी हैं; वाक्य में 'role' आया है।

subject: General English
question_en: Which of the following is a homophone of 'piece'?
question_hi: निम्न में 'piece' का समोच्चारी कौन-सा है?
explanation_hi: 'piece' और 'peace' एक जैसा उच्चारित होते हैं।

subject: General English
question_en: Choose the sentence where the homophones 'flour / flower' are used correctly.
question_hi: वह वाक्य चुनें जहाँ 'flour / flower' समोच्चारी का सही प्रयोग है।
A_en: She added flower to the dough.
A_hi: She added flower to the dough।
B_en: The garden was full of flour.
B_hi: The garden was full of flour।
C_en: Bakers need flour to make bread.
C_hi: Bakers need flour to make bread।
D_en: He gave her a red flour.
D_hi: He gave her a red flour।
explanation_en: 'flour' (आटा) is correct for baking; 'flower' is the bloom.
explanation_hi: 'flour' (आटा) बेकिंग के लिए सही है; 'flower' फूल होता है।

subject: General English
question_en: Which homophone correctly completes the sentence? 'Please wait ___ the signal turns green.'
question_hi: कौन-सा समोच्चारी वाक्य को सही पूरा करता है? 'Please wait ___ the signal turns green.'
explanation_en: 'whether' (if) is the correct homophone here, not 'weather'.
